comments.text: this crossing between the main highway and a small carretera is a punto amarillo. it's very easy to get a hitch in direction havanna, to the bah√≠a de cochinos or in direction santa clara

This is the official punto amarillo on the autopista nacional heading east, which means that you will find yourself in competition with lots of other (Cuban) hitchhikers. Cars are legally expected to stop, and you can raise your chances by waiving with 20 pesos bills (like most Cubans do). waiting time can vary between minutes and hours. to get to the punto amarillo, take the p7 from parque central, get out in san francisco de paula and either walk or take a ride along the primer anillo to the p
